snippet.title: The Other Half Trailer
snippet.description:
A dark fantasy action adventure where you unbury a tale of intimacy and violence in order to cleanse a demonic infestation from a once-beautiful land.

Available now on PC + Mac + Linux:
http://www.theotherhalfgame.com
https://store.steampowered.com/app/917920/The_Other_Half/
https://studioeggroll.itch.io/theotherhalf
http://www.gamejolt.com/games/theotherhalf/359665

Soundtrack is now available at:
https://juliebuchanan.bandcamp.com/album/the-other-half-ost

Follow us:
twitter: https://twitter.com/studioeggroll
